title: yogg
author: yogg
created_time: September 02, 2022, 10:21:10 AMLast edit: September 04, 2022, 08:20:09 PM by yogg
content: Welcome to this auction for three Coldkey sets ! Lot #1 : 4 Gold 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #3Lot #2 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #8 Lot #3 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #9 Lot #1 : 4 Gold 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #3(Actual pictures are from set #2)Lot #2 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #8 Lot #3 : 4 Silver 10th Bitbills anniversary Coldkeys // Serial #9 (Actual pictures are from set #6)End date :   Sunday, 4th September 2022, 22:00:00 Paris time (Countdown timer)Starting bids :  Lot #1 : 0.008BTCLot #2 : 0.006BTCLot #3 : 0.006BTC Bid increments : 0.0005BTCAny bid in the last 10 mn extends the bidding period with a full additional 10mn.(ie. if there is a bid at 21:55, auction ends at 22:09:59, at the end of the full extended period)Free regular tracked shipping worldwide from France. Different (paid) shipping options available if needed.Payment to : >> bc1qg02x2rfq7fdqq4xjqhh8rp3z6nxhy6ae77yfwd << Reputable escrows are more than welcome to help with a transaction. (Buyer pays fees)We (Yogg or Owlcatz) reserve the right to refuse a bid from any user, or ask for a deposit to confirm the bid, without justification.Happy bidding to everyone !
